refnamediv.refpurpose: Plot a scatter plot or a theorical constellation diagram

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: plot_const(x) // Scatter plot view plot_const(x,'i') // Scatter plot view, force identic x and y scale plot_const(wf) // Waveform constellation plot

listitem.para: I/Q signal (I is real part, Q is imaginary part) to plot
waveform object (as can be initialized by wf_init)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Limitations Cannot be used in the same figure as other plots (except other plot_const), because of an incompatibility due to the colormap function.
